name: server_admin
title: Server Admin (can monitor the server and change configuration settings)

name: developer
title: Developer (can access developer features like the dev room)

name: moderator
title: Moderator (can access chat messages and bann users)

name: game_master
title: Game Master (can access every item in the game world and modify the game world)

name: operator
title: Operator (like a server admin, but cannot change settings and so on, more readonly access to server admin features)
